name: tm24
effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
flavor_text.platinum: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
